name: Airport - Lost & Found Division
description:
You're working in an airport, and you have to find people's bags! They're rather small-brained so they can't remember where they've left their precious belongings. The airport is packed full of people, so you're going to have to jump over things to get people their belongings on time...

How to Play

To score points, you need to return luggage to people. Stand next to a person with a ring around them to take on their request. You then need to track down the luggage and return it to them before the time runs out!

WASD - Move
Space - Jump
E - Pick up / Throw

Credits

Joe Shanahan - Programming, 3D

Amy Elliott - Programming, Airport Level Design, Sound FX/Music

Erin Somervail - VFX and Shaders

Scott Richards - Programming

Tash Briggs - 3D, Sound FX

Christian Elliott - 2D Design (Luggage)

Royalty Free Music (FatCaps, Panama Hat) & Royalty Free Ambient Sounds found on: GameSounds.xyz
